summary: Maerwen has been updated to version 2.0. She is still located at the Four Shields Tavern in Dragonbridge. I have added various versions of her with a Apachii hairstyle and the Vanilla style she used before. I have updated her spells and perks a little too.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/12989-1-1345953401.jpg[/img]


[b]Maerwen is a Wood Elf adventurer ready to join you on your next quest. She is a Ranger/Pathfinder type character and is sandboxed/located at The Four Shields Tavern in Dragon Bridge. This was my original concept for a more human looking Wood Elf and I have been sitting on this file for about a month undecided on if I wanted to release her. I used a skin tone that closely matched Vanilla\'s as well as her eye color (This character is actually the forerunner to my Braithwen mod until I took a different direction). She is fairly short and light weight at a height scale of .96 and a weight of 15 (The Mercenary armor she is wearing in some of the pictures features automatic breast scaling, she is about half that size up top). I only gave her a couple spells; Conjure Familiar, Healing and Candlelight.[/b]



Required: 
Human eyes for Elves by Porcelyn: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=195

ApachiiSkyHairFemale_v_1_0 for Update 2.0 Versions
ApachiiSkyHair 1.4 for Older Versions
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10168

Maerwen is equipped with one Iron Dagger and no clothes \"Nude\"! Note: Using the console command \"equipitem (item number) 1\" will permanently add armor or other items unless you use \"removeitem+ID Number+quantity\" to reverse it. See the link I posted towards the bottom of the page for more detailed instructions on console commands.

She is available either essential or non-essential and can be married
Custom hair, skin and makeup \"coloring\" by me.
Voice: Young Eager
Location: Four Shields Tavern - Dragon Bridge 

For Maerwen to appear as she does in my images use the following mods;

Realistic Eyes for Woodelves: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3566
Bella\'s Better Faces with Makeup version 1 with no shine (in some photos):
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2812
CBBEv3 with Navetseas CBBEv3 body texture (feminine arms and toned abs). http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6554
Eyebrows: Calientes Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition -CBBE- Darker Neater Eyebrows D/L
Beauty Marks: Calientes Dirt to Beauty Marks Can be found under her body mod near eyebrows!
YOU WILL  WANT TO USE THIS MOD OR SHE\'S GOING TO BE A VERY VERY DIRTY GIRL... >:) 
Pretty Lips by Danariel: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=1167

I have her wearing:

Dovahkiin Mercenary Gear by Lustrianna http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=15804
Remodeled Armor CBBEv3M by MAK: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13004
Bandolier - Bags and Pouches by Dragten
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=16438
Sword from LustDesign - Sovngarde Steel Armor v2: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=16096

Helpful Console Commands: http://www.uesp.net/wiki/Skyrim:Console 

As always endorsements are much appreciated. I also love seeing pics and hearing feedback on my mods.

Thank you,

FalmerBane
author: FalmerBane
